name: NPR
text:
President Trump says he will create a commission to promote "patriotic education" as well as a grant to develop a "pro-American curriculum."

The federal government does not have jurisdiction over school curriculum.
https://t.co/VGwI2TY0V1

name: NPR
text: Today on #NPRConsiderthis, campaigns and political parties have staffed up their legal war rooms, making this campaign season one of the most litigated ever.  We look at the lawsuits already filed and what might come next. https://t.co/tu29AyYbGL

name: NPR
text:
The postmaster general, in a "tense" call with top U.S. election officials, said his agency is equipped to handle the expected increase in mail volume during this election season.
https://t.co/zLwIC5p1U7
